Html:
Hi,

Can we add new module to ModuleCatalog after bootsrapper has initialized. And how it can be done?

Best regards,
Alexey Zakharov.

Intrigued by your question (I can see where I could use this in my current application) I did some research and a proof of concept.  Results blogged about on the following link:

http://www.global-webnet.net/blogengine/post/2009/02/27/CompositeWPFPrism-Adding-modules-after-BootStrapper.aspx
